name: Code Quiz
description: This is on of my first projects. The app is interacting with the DOM in Javascript. It incoporates the use of dynamic buttons, timers as well as using Local Storage to keep track of users score, and allows users to input their name at the end.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: Weather application using API calls to grab current weather conditions and a 5 day forecast. Tech used: Javascript, HTML, and CSS

name: Lost No More
description: A travel app that uses openweather and google api's. Tech used: Api's, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bulma

name: Tech Babble
description: A CMS-style blog site. Tech used: MySQL, Sequelize, and Handlebars.

name: Track the Burn
description: A full-stack fitness tracker. Technologies used: Express.js, MongoDB, Mongoose, Node.js, and deployed on Heroku.

name: Employee Directory
description: A React App that allows you to search and filter through a list of employees. Technologies used: React.js, Node.js, Axios, Heroku.

name: Whats in my belly!
description: A full-stack food tracker. The technologies used on this group project are: MySQL, Express, Handlebars and Node.
